topic.title: [Suggestion] An enhancement on connections against interference from the GFW.
topic.body:
Concerned with tracker servers blocked by Chinese government, I have a suggestion for connection to the network.
If Magnet links assumed the role of tracker servers from which users attain initial nodes, the process cannot be interfered that data necessary for initialization (i.e. initial nodes that help users connect to others and hence the Zeronet) was downloaded, contrasted with servers accessed through IP being defenseless against blocking.
It might be one of the solutions against the interference from Chinese bureaucrats' efforts to stop nodes communicate with each other.
